biotools.summary: Matlab toolbox that uses mutual information and related measures to infer and display secondary structures (including pseudoknots). Given a sequence alignment It computes and displays the mutual and sequence information of the alignment. MIfold also uses a dynamic programming algorithm to predict the secondary structure with maximal total mutual information.

bioschemas.name: MIfold
